forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 47. South southwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. North wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
In the stillness of the early morning, Downtown San Francisco lies beneath a clear sky, stretching toward an inviting day. The air is crisp, tinged with the faintest hint of dampness, a gentle reminder of the city’s embrace of cool coastal winds. As the sun prepares to rise, the promise of warmth fills the atmosphere, with anticipated highs nearing sixty-five degrees. The northward breeze, a soft companion, plays lightly through the streets, whispering of moments ahead that beckon to be enjoyed.

Throughout the day, the clarity will remain unmarred, allowing the changing light to breathe life into the cityscape. Dressed sensibly in layers, one will want a light jacket to fend off the occasional chill as the afternoon progresses. The absence of fog this morning is a delightful change, allowing the city’s charm to shine unabated. This splendid weather invites gentle explorations; perhaps a leisurely stroll through Golden Gate Park, where an awakening nature invites contemplation, or a quiet moment spent at a local café, savoring the rich aroma of freshly brewed coffee while watching the world come alive. The day is poised to embrace both tranquility and vibrancy, a perfect canvas for simple joys.
